College of Applied Health Sciences     Search the site      Toggle Menu     Search             College of Applied Health Sciences     College of Applied Health Sciences   Google Translate  Main Menu    Applying          Degrees and Deadlines    Beyond the Classroom    Tuition and Aid    Newly Admitted Students      Academics           Departments and Programs         Biomedical and Health Information Sciences           Disability and Human Development           Kinesiology and Nutrition           Occupational Therapy           Physical Therapy           Rehabilitation Sciences         Departments and Programs      Research          Research Labs and Centers    Metabolic Kitchen      Community Services          Assistive Technology Unit    Developmental Disabilities Family Clinic    Occupational Therapy Faculty Practice    Physical Therapy Faculty Practice      Alumni          Give to AHS          Give to AHS    Where to Give      AHS Alumni Awards          Alumni Award Recipients      Meet Our Alumni    Corporate Partners Program    News    Events    Contact      About AHS          College News    College Calendar    Committees    Contact       Eyebrow menu    Inside AHS    AHS Directory    Give to AHS    UIC menu    UIC.edu    UI Health    Campus Map      Search the site                     COVID-19 on Inside AHS  COVID-19 updates, resources and announcements for AHS students, faculty and staff                    College of  Applied Health  Sciences                 AHS Alumni      View Menu              You're a member of one of UIC's oldest, yet most elite, alumni communities   There are some 12,000 AHS alumni. Each has their own story, with a common thread: understanding what is, imagining what could be, and creating what will be through professional and personal practice. Connect with AHS to be inspired, and to inspire others.       Send us an update       Submit a nomination       Request transcripts             AHS Connection  View photos of AHS alumni and friends connecting with one another at various UIC-sponsored events across the U.S.   View all photo albums        Resources   Explore the services and perks available to you as a member of our alumni community.        UIC Library   Apply for an alumni borrowing card to continue to check out materials from the library         Career services   Learn about career development resources and services available to UIC alumni         Campus recreation   Access the Student Recreation Facility, Sport & Fitness Center and Outdoor Field Complex         UIC Bookstore   Purchase UIC apparel, books and gift cards for the biggest Sparky fans in your life         UIC Alumni Association   Connect with the first alumni association dedicated to engaging UIC alumni and building pride         Illinois Connection Advocacy Network   Help gain greater federal and state support for UIC by increasing awareness of our impact           You make us proud            Arnold Lee '10 BS KINES  Chicago Bulls Assistant Athletic Trainer Arnold Lee '10 BS KINES helps the team perform at its best      Meet Arnold              Tina Esposito '97 BS HIM  Listed among the "Most Powerful Women in Healthcare IT," Tina advances technology to enhance patient-focused care      Meet Tina              Luca Badetti '15 PHD DIS  In his life and work, Luca compels us to embrace our inabilities, becoming more complete and connected human beings      Meet Luca              Brian Taliesin '13 MS HI  Brian unites people, technology and data to make life-saving vaccines more available to the children of sub-Saharan Africa      Meet Brian              Vanessa Ruiz '10 MS BVIS  In her online gallery Street Anatomy , Vanessa explores the intersection between medical illustration and contemporary art in public spaces      Meet Vanessa              Eric Meredith '12 MS NUT  Using his knowledge of nutrition, exercise and education, Eric creates comics that encourage children to eat right, stay fit and get healthy      Meet Eric            AHS Magazine       AHS Magazine is the premier publication for and about alumni and friends of the UIC College of Applied Health Sciences. Share news of your life since leaving us: new job, award, project, media mention or other notable achievement. We want to hear it!
